---
name: Meeting Notes Template
about: Track a unit of work within the project lifecycle
title: "Upload Weekly Meeting Notes to Wiki: Week XX"
labels: []
assignees: []
---

## 1. Summary
Document the notes from the most recent project meeting and publish them on the project Wiki.

---

## 2. Background / Rationale
Weekly meetings are used to discuss progress, requirements, and planning. Notes must be documented and shared so that all team members have a common understanding of what was discussed and what actions were agreed upon.

---

## 3. Goals
- Capture key points from the meeting  
- Record decisions made  
- List agreed action items  
- Publish notes on Wiki  

---

## 4. Proposed Approach
Use the agreed minimal meeting notes format to summarize the meeting. Review notes briefly within the team, then upload to the Wiki under the weekly meeting notes section.

---

## 5. Tasks / Breakdown
- [ ] Collect rough notes from meeting  
- [ ] Write notes using meeting notes format  
- [ ] Review notes with team  
- [ ] Upload to Wiki  

---

## 6. Dependencies
- Related to: Project documentation  

---

## 7. Deliverables
- Wiki page containing meeting notes  

---

## 8. Acceptance Criteria
This issue is considered complete when:

- [ ] Meeting notes are written  
- [ ] Notes are uploaded to Wiki  
- [ ] Team confirms accessibility  

---

## 9. References
- Project Wiki  

---

## 10. Notes
This issue should be created for each weekly meeting.
